info.name: HTSEventFlex API
info.description: Complete API collection for HTSEventFlex platform - Event management with blockchain integration

request.description: Register new user. Role can be: gig, organizer, or host
Login user with email and password only. Role is NOT required - it's stored in the user record.
Get gig worker dashboard with stats
Event types: function, corporate, festival, exhibition, hackathon, workshop, webinar, networking, fundraiser, retreat
Platform fee is auto-calculated (100 - organizer% - gigs%)
Verifies attendance and triggers payment release
